Sentence.sentence: Today's teenagers admire their parents and welcome parental guidance about important matters such as career choice—though certainly not Mom and Dad's advice on matters of personal taste, such as music or fashion.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Teenagers of today often turn to their parents for advice on such important matters as career choice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Schoololeavers may moan, but they have little choice but to embrace university and the student debt that comes with it.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: No business likes to admit that it sells addictive poison as a lifestyle choice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Today, a visit to a lighting store reveals a stunning array of choices.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: It is quite easy, with all that choice, to change a light bulb.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: If you want to change his course, you have only a few choices: you can stop him, transferring ( ' , possibly painfully) some of his kinetic energy ( ' ,  动能 ) to your own body, or you can approach alongside and slowly apply pressure to gradually alter his course.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: in different parts of the countrybefore a final choices made prior to a national campaign.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: and the choice of commencement speakers often reflects a balance of institutional priorities and aspirations
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Oprah was a widely popular choice
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The most popular option: write on a topic of your choice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: my IDP walks her or him through the process of setting short-term goals directed toward accumulating new skills and experiences important for that career choice
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: An investigation found that many of the super-rich were baffled by the infinite choices their money made available.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: That may be because they have had plenty of younger ones to choose from, partly thanks to the post-war baby-boom and partly because over the past few decades many more women have entered the labour force, increasing employers' choice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: To classify parenting as a personal choice for which there is no collective responsibility is not merely to ignore the social benefits of good parenting; really, it is to steal those benefits because they accrue (不断积累) to the whole of society as today's children become tomorrow's productive citizenry (公民).
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Why does the author object to classifying parenting as a personal choice
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I imagine that what my parents were trying to teach me was to take responsibilities for my actions and my choices.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: That sounds like a great thing, but as a recent study has shown, too many choices can make us confused, unhappy, even paralyzed with indecision.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Even five years ago most people faced a choice.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Graduate students and postdocs, who often are working on their lab head's grant, may have no choice if their supervisor or another senior colleague opposes sharing.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: If I want to continue ahead with this dream of only my own business, I have no other choice.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月六级真题（第二套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: If you can afford to buy prestige, that's your choice.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: In any case, if I could do it again, I'd still make the same choice.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: It is as if there is something fun and liberating about making someone else's choice.
Sentence.come: 2018年6月六级真题（第三套）阅读 Section C

Sentence.sentence: It's also your choice if you want to go out at night, but you will be foolish to let that affect your class performance during the day.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Thus, while printing enormously increased access to books by making cheap, high-volume production possible, it also reduced choice.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月六级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含有"选择"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: choice, alternative, preference, option, selection, election
means: choice ： 侧重指自由选择的权利或特权。
alternative ： 指在相互排斥的两者之间作严格的选择，也可指在两者以上中进行选择。
preference ： 侧重因偏见、爱好或判断等而进行选择。
option ： 着重特别给予的选择权利或权力，所选物常常相互排斥。
selection ： 指作广泛的选择，着重选择者的识别力或鉴赏力。
election ： 强调目的和达到目的判断能力。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词均有"极好的"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: excellent, choice, splendid, select, prime, first-rate
means: excellent ： 通常指事物在等级品位以及职位级别等方面的最优或接近最优。
choice ： 指通过精心挑选达到水平，尤指罕见或品质精良的商品。
splendid ： 口语常用词，指非常令人满意，显得完美无缺。
select ： 指精挑细选出来作为范例的物或人。
prime ： 常指最重要、价值最高的东西，也可以表示最佳、最典型或最高的人或物。
first-rate ： 多用于指对抽象事物的主观评估，有时含夸大、自负的意味。

Sentence.sentence: A warm drink of milk before bed has long been the best choice for those wanting a good night's sleep.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: An engineer named Ellis Chesbrough convinced the city that it had no choice but to build the pipes above ground and then cover them with dirt.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Before choices are finalised, parents/careers will be asked to.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Big cities generally have heavy traffic and expensive parking, but there you have a choice of taking public transport, which is cheaper than driving.
Sentence.come: 2014年高考英语全国卷1 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Both my parents had a great influence upon my choice of work.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Building owners were faced with a choice: either change the first floors of their buildings into basements, and the second stories into main floors, or hoist the entire buildings to meet the new street level.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语湖南卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: But consumers do have a choice.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语陕西卷 阅读理解 阅读B 原文

Sentence.sentence: Color choices in this range are a step up from the small ones in two major ways.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: First, clean it and season it with your choice of spices.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Forms will be available in school and online for them to indicate their choices and return to school.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: If you want to take an underground journey, which place is the best choice?
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读A 题设

Sentence.sentence: If you work out bright and early in the morning, you will be more likely to stick to healthy food choices throughout the day.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷2 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: It had also given me a choice, either to leave that page blank or to keep writing the story with hope.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语江苏卷 完形填空 原文

Sentence.sentence: Making right career choices is crucial to personal success.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 选项

Sentence.sentence: Medium color choices are generally furniture pieces such as sofa, dinner tables or bookshelves.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: Milk is also sugar-free and additive-free with nutritionists recommending skimmed milk as the best choice before bed as it is the least fattening.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语四川卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: Regardless of your choice of course, you'll develop your language ability both quickly and effectively.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: Small color choices bring with them the significant benefit of being easily changeable.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 阅读理解 七选五 原文

Sentence.sentence: So at dinner time, you'd have a lot of choices.
Sentence.come: 2018年高考英语全国卷I 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: Sorry, I just wish they didn't give me so many choices.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 听力 原文

Sentence.sentence: The woman gives the man so many choices.
Sentence.come: 2015年高考英语上海卷 听力 选项

Sentence.sentence: To people who are used to the limited choice of apples such as golden delicious and royal gala in supermarkets, it can be quite an eye opener to see the range of classical apples still in existence, such as decio which was grown by the romans.
Sentence.come: 2016年高考英语全国卷3 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: Understanding technological trends is very important for correctly designing economic policies, both at the national and the international levels, and for making the right career choices at the individual level.
Sentence.come: 2019年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读C 原文

Sentence.sentence: When the polluting industries argue that we've lost the battle to control carbon pollution and have no choice but to adapt, it's a nonsense designed to make the case for business as usual.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语江苏卷 阅读理解 阅读D 原文

Sentence.sentence: You accidentally reveal to entire company what menu choices you would prefer at the staff christmas dinner, or what holiday you'd like to take.
Sentence.come: 2017年高考英语天津卷 阅读理解 阅读A 原文

Sentence.sentence: The same dramatic technological changes that have provided marketers with more ( ' , and more diverse) communications choices have also increased the risk that passionate consumers will voice their opinions in quicker, more visible, and much more damaging ways.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We are still at the beginning of this revolution and small choices now may turn out to have gigantic consequences later.
Sentence.come: 出自-2018年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: So when young people are critical of an over-tweeting president, they reveal a mental discipline in thinking skills - and in their choices on when to share on social media.
Sentence.come: 出自-2018年考研阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: "Not choice, but habit rules the unreflecting herd," william Wordsworth said in the 19th century.
Sentence.come: 2009年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: A young man can decide on a likely spouse on his own and then ask his parents to arrange the marriage negotiations, or the young man's parents may make the choice of a spouse, giving the child little to say in the selection.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: Asked about his choice of career, he says at high school he considered medical school before switching to electrical engineering.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: In Cambodia, the choice of a spouse is a complex one for the young male.
Sentence.come: 2016年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: In other words, the choice to share news on social media may be the heart of the issue.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: The survey they asks whether they worked less than 35 hours in that week because they wanted to workless than full time or because they had no choice.
Sentence.come: 2015年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Younger children should feel like they're choosing their home—without actually getting a choice in the matter, said Adam Bailey, a real estate attorney based in New York.
Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

jx.jx_en_mean: that one chooses or has chosen
Preferred above others of the same kind or set
jx.jx_cn_mean: 优先选择的：在同一类或同一组中比别的更受欢迎的

lj.lj_ly: “the much used leveraged buyout as the weapon of choice”(&b{Alison Leigh Cowan})
lj.lj_ls: “把举债经营、全部收买的老办法当作特别武器”(&b{艾利森·利·考恩})

entry.def: If there is a choice of things, there are several of them and you can choose the one you want.

example.ex: It's available in a choice of colours...
At lunchtime, there's a choice between the buffet or the set menu...
example.tran: 午餐可以吃自助餐，也可以选套餐。

entry.def: Your choice is someone or something that you choose from a range of things.

example.ex: Although he was only grumbling, his choice of words made Rodney angry.
example.tran: 尽管他只是在咕哝，可是他的措词却让罗德妮恼火。
福楠—梅森百货商店的上等巧克力

entry.def: If you have no choice but to do something or have little choice but to do it, you cannot avoid doing it.

example.ex: They had little choice but to agree to what he suggested.
example.tran: 他们别无选择，只好接受他的提议。

entry.def: The thing or person of your choice is the one that you choose.

example.ex: ...tickets to see the football team of your choice...
example.tran: 观看自己喜欢的足球队比赛的门票

example.ex: In many societies children still marry someone of their parents' choice.
example.tran: 在许多社会，子女结婚仍然只能听从父母之命。

entry.def: The item of choice is the one that most people prefer.

example.ex: The drug is set to become the treatment of choice for asthma worldwide...
example.tran: 这种药将会成为全世界治疗哮喘的首选。

example.ex: The drink of choice seems to be vodka.
example.tran: 最受欢迎的酒似乎是伏特加。

means.word_mean: 1. the person or thing chosen or selected;
2. the act of choosing or selecting;
3. one of a number of things from which only one can be chosen;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French chois, from choisir 'choose', of Germanic origin and related to choose

sentences.cn: 他出言不逊。
sentences.en: (humorous)He used some pretty choice (= rude or offensive) language.

sentences.en: If I had the choice, I would stop working tomorrow.

sentences.en: He had no choice but to leave (= this was the only thing he could do) .

sentences.cn: 19世纪时，威廉·华兹华斯曾说过，“是习惯，而不是选择，在支配那些不善于思考的人。”

sentences.cn: 在柬埔寨，对于年轻男性而言，伴侣的选择是一个复杂的事情。
sentences.en: In Cambodia, the choice of a spouse is a complex one for the young male.

sentences.cn: 年轻男性可以自己选定合适的伴侣，然后让父母安排提亲；或者父母为年轻男性选择伴侣，而在选择的过程中几乎不会给孩子一点发言权。
sentences.en: A young man can decide on a likely spouse on his own and then ask his parents to arrange the marriage negotiations, or the young man’s parents may make the choice of a spouse, giving the child little to say in the selection.

sentences.cn: 换句话说，选择在社交媒体上分享新闻可能才是该问题出现的症结所在。
sentences.en: In other words, the choice to share news on social media may be the heart of the issue.

sentences.cn: 但恐惧是可以选择的。”
sentences.en: But fear is a choice.

sentences.cn: 当被问及他的职业选择时,他声称高中时曾考虑过上医学院,但之后却改变主意去学了电器工程。
sentences.en: Asked about his choice of career, he says at high school he considered medical school before switching to electrical engineering.

sentences.cn: 有这么多种类可供选择，使换灯泡成为一件非常容易的事。
sentences.en: It is quite easy, with all that choice, to change a light bulb.
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 现在的青少年崇拜他们的父母，而且很希望在职业选择等重大问题上得到父母的指导——当然在音乐、时尚风格等有关个人品位的问题上，他们并不希望父母提什么建议。
sentences.en: Today’s teenagers admire their parents and welcome parental guidance about important matters such as career choice—though certainly not Mom and Dad’s advice on matters of personal taste, such as music or fashion.

sentences.cn: 老鼠或鸽子可能不是照顾病人明摆着的选择，但这些动物有一些可以帮助治疗人类疾病的[26]优秀技能。
sentences.en: A rat or pigeon might not be the obvious choice to tend to someone who is sick, but these creatures have some 26 superior skills that could help the treatment of human diseases.
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第一套)| 阅读

sentences.cn: 第一个决定就是选择课程。
sentences.en: The  first  decision  is  your choice  of  course.
sentences.from: 16年6月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 在这个问题上，我们别无选择。
sentences.en: We have no choice in the matter.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第二套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 教他们依据使用用意进行选择。
sentences.en: They help them relate their choice to its intended use
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第一套）| 听力

sentences.cn: 第三题: 冰箱与女人有什么相同与不同之处?
sentences.en: The 3 rd problem: What do freezer and woman have identical with different point?

sentences.cn: 他们别无选择,只能投降.
sentences.en: They had no other choice but to surrender.

sentences.cn: 方格 、 图案与粗花呢仍为主流, 田园风味又是另一种选择.
sentences.en: Pane, design and tweed still are the mainstream, rurality is another kind of choice.

sentences.cn: 不管在什么季节, 柠檬都是一种很好的选择.
sentences.en: No matter what season, lemons are a good choice.

sentences.cn: 本届政府承诺扩大父母在教育方面的选择权。
sentences.en: This government is committed to extending parental choice in education.

sentences.cn: 每种方案都有自己的优缺点, 而选择权在你手里.
sentences.en: Each has its advantages , each has its disadvantages, the choice is yours.

sentences.cn: 那么你会如何选择? 每种方案都有自己的优缺点, 而选择权在你手里.
sentences.en: Which do you choose? Each has its advantages , each has its disadvantages, the choice is yours.

sentences.cn: 我们杀害了我们未诞生的并且称它选择权.
sentences.en: We have killed our unborn and called it choice.

sentences.cn: 纵观历史, 人实际上没有任何选择权.
sentences.en: Throughout history, practically nobody had any choice.

sentences.cn: 在这两个之中,你有选择权.
sentences.en: You have your choice between the two.

sentences.cn: 选择权在你.
sentences.en: The choice is yours.

sentences.cn: 对于选修课程的选择权完全交给了学生.
sentences.en: The choice of elective subjects is left entirely to the students.

sentences.cn: 这些人轻易就把一些重要概念忽略掉了,比如自由选择权 、 激励和个性.
sentences.en: Those persons conveniently ignore such critical concepts as freedom of choice, motivation, and individuality.

sentences.cn: A: “ 亚利桑那州有优先选择权. ”
sentences.en: A : " Arizona got first choice. "

sentences.cn: 该公司对为客户选择权利的关注类似于私营公司的做法.
sentences.en: Its concern for customer choice resembles that of a private company.

sentences.cn: 选择权已不在他们手中了.
sentences.en: The choice is no longer in their disposition.

sentences.cn: 世界其他国家可以在储备外币时, 获得除美元外另一强势货币的选择权.
sentences.en: When other countries store the foreign exchange, the have another choice except American dollar.

sentences.cn: 但从另一方面来说, 我们都受益于这些技术进步, 其中包括消费者所能获得的无穷无尽的选择权.
sentences.en: On the other hand, we all benefit from these changes, including in endless consumer choice.

sentences.cn: 它可以是工作丫, 或者另台局域网的机器. 选择权属于你的.
sentences.en: It can be your workstation, or another machine on your lan. The choice is yours.

sentences.cn: 政府不断地宣扬选择权和市场的力量，人们的期望值也因此提高了。
sentences.en: Expectations have been raised with the Government going on about choice and market forces.

sentences.cn: 这是场威胁到人民选择权的运动，是场有可能建立神权政体的运动。
sentences.en: It is a movement that threatens the choice of the people and threatens to install a theocratic state.

sentences.cn: 博物馆里的收藏品中包括了很多上等的物品.
sentences.en: The collection in the museum contained many choice items.

sentences.cn: 上帝已经选择了一个国家,让他可以把精选的谷粒种植在这片荒土上.
sentences.en: God hath sifted a nation that he might send choice grain into this wilderness.

sentences.cn: 他上了三道菜, 每一道都配上了他们精选的美酒.
sentences.en: He served three courses, each with their own choice wine.

Sentence.sentence: Either way, we have choices about how we respond to it when it comes.

Sentence.sentence: We must be honest about our actions and avoid excuses, if we fool ourselves into believing we're not doing anything wrong, we can't see the real choice we're making - and that leads to bad decisions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: One who has integrity is bound by and follows moral and ethical (道德上的) standards even when making life's hard choices, choices which may be clouded by stress, pressure to succeed, or temptation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: We must learn to recognize risks, because if we can't see the risks we're taking, we can't make responsible choices
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But individual choices have an intense cumulative (累积的) effect.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: To ensure we make responsible choices

Sentence.sentence: To give customers a wider range of choices.

Sentence.sentence: He studied the designs of various choices
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Red meat, which used to be the most popular choice for dinner, is no longer an American favorite

Sentence.sentence: I imagine that what my parents were trying to teach me was to take responsibilities for my actions and my choices.

Sentence.sentence: The beach resort is a good choice.

Sentence.sentence: A rat or pigeon might not be the obvious choice to tend to someone who is sick, but these creatures have some 26 superior skills that could help the treatment of human diseases.
